items.name: Gyoza (Pork or Vegetable)
items.description: Pan-fried dumplings served with a savory dipping sauce.

items.name: Shrimp Tempura
items.description: Crispy fried shrimp and seasonal vegetables with tempura sauce.

items.name: Agedashi Tofu
items.description: Lightly fried tofu in a dashi-based sauce, garnished with scallions and grated daikon.

items.name: Assorted Nigiri (6 pcs)
items.description: Chef's selection of fresh fish over seasoned sushi rice.

items.name: Sashimi Platter (9 pcs)
items.description: Finest cuts of raw fish, no rice.

items.name: Spicy Tuna Roll
items.description: Tuna mixed with spicy sauce, cucumber, and avocado.

items.name: Dragon Roll
items.description: Eel and cucumber inside, topped with avocado and eel sauce.

items.name: Tonkotsu Ramen
items.description: Rich pork broth ramen with chashu, soft-boiled egg, scallions, and nori.

items.name: Chicken Teriyaki
items.description: Grilled chicken breast with house-made teriyaki sauce, served with rice and vegetables.

items.name: Beef Yakiniku
items.description: Slices of tender beef marinated and grilled, served with rice.

items.name: Vegetable Yakisoba
items.description: Stir-fried Japanese noodles with mixed vegetables and savory sauce.

items.name: Mochi Ice Cream
items.description: Assorted mochi filled with ice cream (green tea, red bean, vanilla).

items.name: Green Tea Cheesecake
items.description: Creamy cheesecake infused with Japanese matcha.

items.name: Ramune (Japanese Soda)
items.description: Popular Japanese carbonated soft drink with a marble seal.
